DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate usefulness of new designed winged stent(SEMS).
DOC.brief_title: The Usefulness of Self-expandable Metal Stents(SEMS) for Malignant Gastric Outlet Obstruction: a Prospective Study Using New Designed Stents
DOC.criteria: 1. Gastric outlet obstruction symptom 2. Diagnosis of gastric outlet obstruction by radiologist or endoscopist 3. Gastric outlet obstruction by malignant disease 4. Aged over 19 5. Informed consent 1. Gastric outlet obstruction by benign disease or infectious disease 2. Could not endoscopic intervention by poor general condition 3. Refusal of patient
